title: The Coronation Sacrifice
description: a piece form the cycle of tapestries woven for Marie de\' Medici, The Stories of Queen Artemisia, based on an epic account by Nicolas Houel; woven in the Faubourg Saint-Marcel Manufactory of Marc de Comans and Frauçais de la Planche between 1611 and 1627; warp undyed wool, 6-7½ ends per cm., weft dyed wool and silk, 32-40 ends per cm.
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
